attributes.additional_details: Parking fines in England are going under review with the look to increase this fine by £50 taking your average fine from £60-£70 to £120-£130 and where only too aware some people park in silly places but some people are late coming back to car, some people are poor at parking and wheels over the line, whilst yes frustrating when somebody is taking more room then needed but £120-£130 near 3 days’ work for a 2 hour mistake, these planned increases should be scrapped and motorists should be left alone.
